input.sentences: having a little party with some friends .
setting up the table for when everyone is ready to eat .
outside playing with others is always so much fun .
swinging is one of my all time favorite outside activities .
can`t sleep because of all of the fun of the day | but soon they will be dreaming .
output.sentences: Trixie was excited about her birthday party, because all her friends were coming.
She helped Mum set the table.
They had so much fun playing in the garden.
Her favourite thing though, was when Uncle Jon pushed her on the swing.
Afterwards they had a sleepover and all that fun soon led to dreaming.
